Description.Name: Artemis IV LRM Ammo [Half]
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Artemis IV LRM Ammo Bins each contain <color=#6aa84f>120 rounds</color> and may feed multiple weapons. 

Artemis IV LRMs have an enhanced guidance system that require an Artemis-equipped launcher but grant a <color=#f79924>+4 bonus to direct-fire accuracy.</color> Indirect fire accuracy is not affected.
